pitrou commented on pull request #3418: [WIP] ARROW-4281: [CI] Use Ubuntu Xenial VMs on Travis-CI [skip appveyor]

   The R build job still uses Trusty, though, as the community-supported R images don't work with Xenial.

pitrou commented on issue #3418: [WIP] ARROW-4281: [CI] Use Ubuntu Xenial VMs on Travis-CI [skip appveyor]
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3418#issuecomment-455190609
 
 
   The Java Gandiva tests fail and I don't know how to go about solving that. @pravindra Would you like to help?
   The errors look as follows:
   ```
   [ERROR] Tests run: 2, Failures: 0, Errors: 2, Skipped: 0, Time elapsed: 0.706 s <<< FAILURE! - in org.apache.arrow.gandiva.evaluator.ExpressionRegistryTest
   [ERROR] testTypes(org.apache.arrow.gandiva.evaluator.ExpressionRegistryTest)  Time elapsed: 0.689 s  <<< ERROR!
   java.lang.UnsatisfiedLinkError: org.apache.arrow.gandiva.evaluator.ExpressionRegistryJniHelper.getGandivaSupportedDataTypes()[B
   	at org.apache.arrow.gandiva.evaluator.ExpressionRegistryTest.testTypes(ExpressionRegistryTest.java:33)
   ```
   
   See full log here:
   https://travis-ci.org/apache/arrow/jobs/480883085#L2367
   
   Not much should have changed here, we're just using the Xenial VMs (Ubuntu 16.04) rather than Trusty.
   Information about the Java environment is here:
   ```
   +which java
   /usr/bin/java
   +which mvn
   /usr/bin/mvn
   +java -version
   openjdk version "1.8.0_191"
   OpenJDK Runtime Environment (build 1.8.0_191-8u191-b12-0ubuntu0.16.04.1-b12)
   OpenJDK 64-Bit Server VM (build 25.191-b12, mixed mode)
   +mvn -v
   Apache Maven 3.3.9
   Maven home: /usr/share/maven
   Java version: 1.8.0_191, vendor: Oracle Corporation
   Java home: /usr/lib/jvm/java-8-openjdk-amd64/jre
   Default locale: en_US, platform encoding: UTF-8
   OS name: "linux", version: "4.15.0-1026-gcp", arch: "amd64", family: "unix"
   ```
   https://travis-ci.org/apache/arrow/jobs/480883085#L622-L636
   
 
----------------------------------------------------------------
This is an automated message from the Apache Git Service.
To respond to the message, please log on GitHub and use the
URL above to go to the specific comment.
 
For queries about this service, please contact Infrastructure at:
users@infra.apache.org

URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3418#issuecomment-455210537
 
 
   I’ll look into this tomorrow (my time).
   
   Sent from my iPhone
   
   > On 17-Jan-2019, at 7:59 PM, Antoine Pitrou <notifications@github.com> wrote:

   > Not much should have changed here, we're just using the Xenial VMs (Ubuntu 16.04) rather than Trusty.

issuetype.description: A task that needs to be done.
issuetype.name: Task

fields.description: We're currently using the Trusty VMs on Travis-CI. Besides the fact that Ubuntu Trusty is soon 5 years old, it forces us to use the old pre-C++ ABI migration conda-forge packages. We should migrate all or most jobs to Xenial.
fields.summary: [CI] Use Ubuntu Xenial (16.04) VMs on Travis-CI
